name: Fiera Capital Corporation 8.25% senior subordinated unsecured debentures
longDescription: Fiera Capital Corp is a Canadian asset management company that offers traditional and alternative investment solutions. It provides investment advisory and related services to institutional investors, private wealth clients, and retail investors. The company offers institutional clients a complete range of traditional and alternative investment strategies through specialized and balanced mandates. Its geographical segments are Canada, United States, and Europe & other.

fullAddress: 1981 McGill College Avenue,Suite 1500, Montreal, QC, CA
